Registry

We are so delighted you are coming to our wedding. A gift is not necessary. Thank you for being in our lives, and celebrating our commitment to each other. If you feel you really must, well, OK. We are registered at a few venues via myregistry.com. This website also allows friends and family to sponsor honeymoon activities (our dream is to travel to Scotland) like a stay at a bed and breakfast, a scotch tasting, or a meal at a nice restaurant. If you like, please feel free to contribute in lieu of a physical gift

Questions? Please feel free to contact us at chargotpina@gmail.com.
